subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The last race of the regular season can be as agonizing for the drivers trying to get in — or stay in — the Chase for the Sprint Cup as it is fun for the fans to watch.
snippet: The last race of the regular season can be as agonizing for the drivers trying to get in — or stay in — the Chase for the Sprint Cup as it is fun for the fans to watch.
